name: Starry Night
description: A famous painting by Vincent van Gogh, depicting a starry night over a small town.

name: Mona Lisa
description: One of the most famous paintings of all time, showing a woman with a mysterious smile.

name: The Persistence of Memory
description: A surrealist painting known for its melting clocks in a dreamlike landscape.

name: The Scream
description: An iconic expressionist painting depicting a figure with a haunted expression against a swirling sky.

name: The Girl with a Pearl Earring
description: A portrait of a young girl wearing a blue and yellow turban with a large pearl earring.

name: The Last Supper
description: A famous mural depicting the moment Jesus shares his final meal with his disciples.

name: Guernica
description: A powerful anti-war painting created in response to the bombing of Guernica during the Spanish Civil War.

name: The Night Watch
description: A large painting depicting a militia company in a dramatic action scene, known for its lighting technique.

name: Water Lilies
description: A series of impressionist paintings depicting Monet's garden pond with floating water lilies.

name: The Kiss
description: A symbolic and sensual painting of a couple embracing, adorned with gold leaf.

name: American Gothic
description: A portrait of a farmer and his daughter standing in front of a farmhouse, symbolizing rural American life.

name: The Birth of Venus
description: A painting depicting the mythological birth of Venus, emerging from the sea.

name: The Creation of Adam
description: A fresco painting from the Sistine Chapel, showing God and Adam reaching out to each other.

name: The Birth of Venus
description: A classical depiction of Venus arriving on the shore, symbolizing beauty and divine love.

name: The Raft of Medusa
description: A dramatic and haunting painting that depicts the aftermath of a shipwreck, with survivors struggling in the sea.

name: Olympia
description: A provocative painting of a reclining nude woman, challenging traditional depictions of female nudes in art.

name: Les Demoiselles d'Avignon
description: A revolutionary painting that marked the beginning of Picasso's Cubist style, featuring five female figures.

name: Self-Portrait with Cropped Hair
description: A self-portrait depicting Kahlo with short hair, symbolizing her rejection of gender expectations and societal norms.

name: The School of Athens
description: A fresco painting representing the great philosophers of Ancient Greece, depicted in a grand architectural space.

name: Nighthawks
description: A famous painting of a late-night diner scene, capturing the loneliness and isolation of modern life.
